title: The Sleeping Prophet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/24/19
itunes:title: The Sleeping Prophet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/24/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Kevin Todeschi explore his work interpreting the health advice of famed healer Edgar Cayce, who made predictions while in a sleeping trance, and whether he believed in reincarnation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
